entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Oxford House
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:19 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 46 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 26.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 45 in the morning and minus 36 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 36. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023
